location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 8. THE TIGRIS FROM KUT AL AMARA TO BAGHDAD.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 182 x 278mm, on sheet 213 x 325mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume II, and shows a stretch of the River Tigris between Kut [Al KÅ«t] and Baghdad in central and eastern Iraq, indicating military operations, cities, towns and routes. Rivers and marshes are printed in blue.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1923.
